input_text:
Job Title: Claims Operations Associate II Hybrid

Location: Richfield, OH

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
National Interstate is a member of Great American Insurance Group. As one of the leading commercial transportation insurers in the nation, we offer risk financing solutions in all 50 states tailored to meet the needs of a wide variety of transportation classes. Our offerings include traditional insurance and innovative alternative risk transfer (ART) programs, including more than a dozen group captive programs catering to niche wheels markets. We are proud to be a multiple Northcoast 99 winner and Cleveland Plain Dealer Top Workplace in Northeast Ohio. It is because of our talented and dedicated team that we are able to live out our company values of integrity, transparency, fairness, accountability, empowerment and collaboration with each transaction we make. If you are ready to join an engaging and driven team such as ours, we would love to hear from you!

Essential Job Functions And Responsibilities

Learns to perform claims processing and payment functions on basic claims for one or more lines. Performs claims support functions:Composes, prepares, reviews, and responds to correspondence.Answers and responds to inquiries and gathers information.May perform mail/file functions. Utilizes the company system(s) to identify the appropriate recipient of correspondence within or outside of the company. Sorts and distributes mail. Maintains/purges documents according to record retention guidelines and distributes files/file systems.Performs general processing, may include updating manuals.May assist with claims numbers, claims setup and entry, electronic imaging or indexing, statistical coverage verification, preparation/entry of claims transactions, preparation/processing recovery, and processing drafts and forms.May perform systems functions, including determining errors/corrections on claims system(s) and/or policies.Provides support to Claims department, developing specialized skills and knowledge related to processing.May enter information into company system(s).Prepares, orders, and maintains records, reports, registers and schedules.Updates claims files and maintains, corrects, and/or updates data using office technology.Performs other duties as assigned.
Job Requirements

Education: High school diploma or equivalent

Experience: Generally, 2 to 4 years of related experience.

Company

NIC National Interstate Corporation

Benefits

We offer competitive healthcare, retirement, and paid time off benefits for full-time and part-time benefit eligible employees.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Claims Operations Associate II Hybrid
job_responsibilities: Performs claims processing and payment functions on basic claims for one or more lines.
Answers and responds to inquiries and gathers information.
Utilizes the company system(s) to identify the appropriate recipient of correspondence within or outside of the company.
Maintains/purges documents according to record retention guidelines and distributes files/file systems.

May assist with claims numbers, claims setup and entry, electronic imaging or indexing, statistical coverage verification, preparation/entry of claims transactions, preparation/processing recovery, and processing drafts and forms.
May perform systems functions, including determining errors/corrections on claims system(s) and/or policies.
Provides support to Claims department, developing specialized skills and knowledge related to processing.
May enter information into company system(s).
Prepares, orders, and maintains records, reports, registers and schedules.
Updates claims files and maintains, corrects, and/or updates data using office technology.
